EmailTemplate.name: DASH_Feb2017.201702_Global_Email_DASH_CPS_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Consolidating Phoenix, Arizona Distribution Centers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SIMPLIFYING OUR PHOENIX DISTRIBUTION PROCESS Dear Honeywell Customer, In order to streamline and improve our delivery performance to you, we are consolidating our distribution centers in the Phoenix, Arizona area to one facility.
From March 15, 2017, Honeywell will begin to transition and ship parts from our new distribution center:
- Honeywell Distribution Center: 1720 E. Grant Street, Phoenix, AZ 85034
Our consolidated facility has a fully approved quality management system for this work and is approved by the FAA to ship to the aftermarket.
Please ensure your receiving, procurement, finance department have this new address in their database to allow proper receipt and processing, preventing any delays at your receiving site.
Please retain previous address in order to continue receiving during transition period.
We are confident this consolidation will help us be more efficient and responsive to you.
Thank you for your business.
Previous Distribution Centers:
- Plant 1009 DVDC (GMS): 21111 N. 19th Ave., Phoenix, AZ 85027 - Plant 1015 ESS-Engines-Phoenix: 111 South 34th Street, Phoenix, AZ 85072 - Plant 1014 SHDC: 1944 E.
